topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Terminating Instances

body.p: You can terminate an instance, as needed.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances link.
In the Instances screen, for the instance you want to terminate, for the instance you want to delete, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Terminate Instance.
To delete multiple instances, click the check box next to name of each instance to delete. Click Terminate Instances.
In the confirmation screen that appears, click Terminate Instance.
The instance is terminated and no longer appears in the instance list.
